name: Pembina Pipeline Corporation
description: Pembina Pipeline Corporation is a leading transportation and midstream service provider in North America, specializing in the transportation of crude oil, natural gas, and natural gas liquids. Founded in 1954 and headquartered in Calgary, Alberta, Pembina operates an extensive network of pipelines, facilities, and processing plants that support the energy industry. The company's operations include conventional pipelines, oil sands pipelines, and facilities necessary for the safe and efficient movement of hydrocarbons. Pembina is committed to sustainability and safety, employing innovative technologies and practices to minimize environmental impact while maximizing operational efficiency. The company is also involved in various growth projects aimed at expanding its infrastructure and service capabilities to meet the increasing demand for energy. Pembina's integrated business model allows it to offer comprehensive solutions that cater to the needs of its customers across the energy value chain. The company prides itself on its corporate governance, community involvement, and dedication to maintaining strong relationships with stakeholders, ensuring a sustainable future for the energy sector.
